column5: I'm not proud of this; but I splashed a lady a couple weeks back. Didn't see the puddle (pond) on the road and hit it doing about 60Klm. Just like in the video there was a wall of water being dumped on her. The next mistake I made was to stop an apologize and offer a ride; oh man did she rip me a new one.  Dan.
Too much funny at someone elses expence LMAO
Thats obviously staged.  But ive done it once to two young teens. I felt horrible.

That's funny. I was waiting for some epic tale of springs birth. Not. For all you folks up in God's country that love the ice and snow and sub zero, don't worry winter will be there again in a few months. Mid September?
